eventChance.name: Event Chance
eventChance.description: The chance for an event to happen. (max: 100, min: 1)

allowedEventsChannels.name: Allowed Event Channels
allowedEventsChannels.description: List of channel ID's for events can happen. Leave empty to enable for all channels.

rewardExperience.name: Reward Experience
rewardExperience.description: How much experience to reward the user who won the event. Set 0 to disable.
